Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide 4 (AI Predicted AMPs, Arg-rich, XXA, UCLl1c)
Sequence Information.Source: AI predicted, Derived from UniProt ID: Q9H7N4, human protein

Literature.Author: Ramos-Llorens M, Bello-Madruga R, Valle J, Andreu D, Torrent M. 2024
Literature.Title: PyAMPA: a high-throughput prediction and optimization tool for antimicrobial peptides.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (45.45%) toDybowskin-2CDYaR: 28%, Y: 17%, V=K: 11%.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 1.3 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 8 uM), A. baumannii (MIC 8 uM), S. enterica (MIC 3.1 uM), S. aureus (MIC 25 uM), E. faecium (MIC 13 uM), and M. luteus (MIC 13 uM).In vitro toxicity:  horse RBC: 15% hemolysis at 150 uM (HC50 >100 uM), less hemo.lytic. HepG2 cell (IC50 154 uM).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in 5-10 mM SDS.
